root: ^Hey I am Bob the new intern. It is a pleasure to meet you!
^I'm Detective C. and that over there is my counterpart, Fish Buddy.
^It is good to have you Bob.
^By the way, the boss wanted me to give you this.

c-0: ^This next case is a big one and the boss says any means necessary to find the culprit.
^I will put it to good use.

BEGINNING: ^I have a few questions for you Bob.
NewCase: ^There has been a robbery. One of the memory guns went missing.
^This is a big deal and the whole office is on edge.
^I'd recommend you go talk to Mr. Dauphin.
Cranky: ^He is really worried about this new case.
DONE: ^It sure is scary thinking that there is a criminal on the loose with a memory gun.
^Who knows what they are using it for.
